title: pinging own floating ip fails with external gateway

comments.content:
Setup:

  flatdhcp multihost nova network with an external gateway defined in dnsmasq.conf
  public_interface != flat_interfave

In this configuration pinging your own floating ip fails because the snatting rule never gets hit.
